category.template: COVID-19 is an infectious disease caused by a coronavirus. Most people infected with the COVID-19 virus will experience mild to moderate respiratory illness and recover without requiring special treatment.

COVID-19 is an infectious disease caused by a coronavirus. Most people infected with the COVID-19 virus will experience mild to moderate respiratory illness and recover without requiring special treatment.
The most common symptoms of COVID-19 are fever, dry cough and tiredness. Loss of sense of smell is also possible.

Wear masks, maintain social distancing( 6 feet distance) and wash your hands frequently.
